sentences.en: A Dutch newspaper photographed the president waiting forlornly in the rain.
sentences.cn: 一份荷兰报纸拍到了总统形单影只地在雨中等待的照片。

sentences.en: As a friend of the Dutch people, we feel truly happy for you and admire your achievements.
sentences.cn: 作为荷兰人民的朋友，我们对你们取得的成就感到由衷的钦佩和高兴。

sentences.en: But just like Dutch in Predator before the final battle, you have to be able to answer only one question about your target before you start: where they are.
sentences.cn: 但就像一战之前的荷兰掠夺者一样，在开始工作之前你必须能够回答实现目标的唯一问题：他们在哪里？

sentences.en: Clogs are part of the Dutch traditional costume.
sentences.cn: 木屐是荷兰传统装束的一部分.

sentences.en: Dutch colonial authorities imprisoned him for his part in the independence movement.
sentences.cn: 荷兰殖民当局因他参加独立运动而把他关押了起来。

sentences.en: English, Dutch and German are cognate languages.
sentences.cn: 英语 、 荷兰语、德语是同语族的语言.

sentences.en: He is one of a small galaxy of Dutch stars on German television.
sentences.cn: 出现在德国电视上的荷兰明星为数不多，他是其中一位。

sentences.en: Nor would they buy the overpriced textiles that the Dutch brought in from India.
sentences.cn: 他们也不会买荷兰人从印度带来的价格过高的纺织品。

sentences.en: The Belgian player Eduardo Masso has reached the final of the Dutch Open in Hilversum.
sentences.cn: 比利时选手爱德华多·马索进入了在希尔弗瑟姆举行的荷兰公开赛的决赛。

sentences.en: The British and Dutch belong to the same race.
sentences.cn: 英国人和荷兰人是同一种族.

sentences.en: The Dutch annihilated the Olympic champions 5-0.
sentences.cn: 荷兰队以5比0完胜奥运冠军队。

sentences.en: The Dutch fleet are sailing up the Thames.
sentences.cn: 荷兰舰队向泰晤士河上游驶去.

sentences.en: The glider was in Dutch airspace.
The old Dutch fort with its thick high walls looks virtually impregnable.
sentences.cn: 古老的荷兰城堡城墙又厚又高，看起来几乎固若金汤。

sentences.en: We went Dutch on a meal in the new restaurant in Shaftesbury Avenue.
sentences.cn: 我们在沙夫茨伯里大道一家新开的饭馆里AA制吃的饭。

sentences.en: When Dutch colonial rule ended in the 19th century the civil service was anglicised.
sentences.cn: 荷兰殖民统治在19世纪结束时，文职部门已被英国化了。

sentences.en: White conned his way into a job as a ware-houseman with Dutch airline, KLM.
sentences.cn: 怀特骗到了一份工作，在荷兰皇家航空公司做仓库管理员。

sentences.en: You'll be amazed at the culinary creations possible in a Dutch oven.
sentences.cn: 荷兰烤箱能够做的食物之多会让你感到惊奇。

phrases.tran_cn: 无法理解的语言；莫名其妙的话
荷兰式拍卖；喊价逐步减低的拍卖
各付己帐；各自付帐的聚餐或娱乐活动
各付各的钱，平摊费用：约会或郊游时各付各的钱

trans.tran_cn: 荷兰人的，荷兰的，荷兰语的
trans.tran_en: relating to the Netherlands, its people, or its language

trans.tran_cn: 费用平摊地；各自付账地
荷兰，荷兰语，各付各的账，酒后之勇，[电影]小鬼精灵
